1: לַמְנַצֵּ֬חַ <sup>5329 </sup> <n>To the chief Musician</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>upon</n> שׁוֹשַׁנִּ֬ים <sup>7799 </sup> <n>upon Shoshannim</n> לְדָוִֽד׃ <sup>1732 </sup> <n>[A Psalm] of David</n> הוֹשִׁיעֵ֥נִי <sup>3467 </sup> <n>Save</n> אֱלֹהִ֑ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>me O God</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> בָ֖אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>are come</n> מַ֣יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>for the waters</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> נָֽפֶשׁ׃ <sup>5315 </sup> <n>in unto [my] soul</n>
2: טָבַ֤עְתִּי ׀ <sup>2883 </sup> <n>I sink</n> בִּיוֵ֣ן <sup>3121 </sup> <n>mire</n> מְ֭צוּלָה <sup>4688 </sup> <n>in deep</n> וְאֵ֣ין <sup>369 </sup> <n>and there</n> מָעֳמָ֑ד <sup>4613 </sup> <n>where [there is] no standing</n> בָּ֥אתִי <sup>935 </sup> <n>I am come</n> בְמַעֲמַקֵּי־ <sup>4615 </sup> <n>into deep</n> מַ֝֗יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n> וְשִׁבֹּ֥לֶת <sup>7641 </sup> <n>where the floods</n> שְׁטָפָֽתְנִי׃ <sup>7857 </sup> <n>overflow</n>
3: יָגַ֣עְתִּי <sup>3021 </sup> <n>I am weary</n> בְקָרְאִי֮ <sup>7121 </sup> <n>of my crying</n> נִחַ֪ר <sup>2787 </sup> <n>is dried</n> גְּר֫וֹנִ֥י <sup>1627 </sup> <n>my throat</n> כָּל֥וּ <sup>3615 </sup> <n>fail</n> עֵינַ֑י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>mine eyes</n> מְ֝יַחֵ֗ל <sup>3176 </sup> <n>while I wait</n> לֵאלֹהָֽי׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>for my God</n>
4: רַבּ֤וּ ׀ <sup>7231 </sup> <n>are more</n> מִשַּׂעֲר֣וֹת <sup>8185 </sup> <n>than the hairs</n> רֹאשִׁי֮ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>of mine head</n> שֹׂנְאַ֪י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>They that hate</n> חִ֫נָּ֥ם <sup>2600 </sup> <n>me without a cause</n> עָצְמ֣וּ <sup>6105 </sup> <n>are mighty</n> מַ֭צְמִיתַי <sup>6789 </sup> <n>they that would destroy</n> אֹיְבַ֣י <sup>341 </sup> <n>me [being] mine enemies</n> שֶׁ֑קֶר <sup>8267 </sup> <n>wrongfully</n> אֲשֶׁ֥ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>What</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>did not</n> גָ֝זַ֗לְתִּי <sup>1497 </sup> <n>[that] which I took not away</n> אָ֣ז <sup>227 </sup> <n>then</n> אָשִֽׁיב׃ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>then I restored</n>
5: אֱ‍ֽלֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>who</n> יָ֭דַעְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>thou knowest</n> לְאִוַּלְתִּ֑י <sup>200 </sup> <n>my foolishness</n> וְ֝אַשְׁמוֹתַ֗י <sup>819 </sup> <n>and my sins</n> מִמְּךָ֥ <sup>4480 </sup> <n>at</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <sup>3582 </sup> <n>are not hid</n>
6: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> יֵ֘בֹ֤שׁוּ <sup>954 </sup> <n>be ashamed</n> בִ֨י ׀ קֹוֶיךָ֮ <sup>6960 </sup> <n>Let not them that wait</n> אֲדֹנָ֥י <sup>136 </sup> <n>on thee O Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> צְבָ֫א֥וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>nay</n> יִכָּ֣לְמוּ <sup>3637 </sup> <n>thee be confounded</n> בִ֣י מְבַקְשֶׁ֑יךָ <sup>1245 </sup> <n>for my sake let not those that seek</n> אֱ֝לֹהֵ֗י <sup>430 </sup> <n>for my sake O God</n> יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n>
7: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>Because</n> עָ֭לֶיךָ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>your sake</n> נָשָׂ֣אתִי <sup>5375 </sup> <n>Because for thy sake I have borne</n> חֶרְפָּ֑ה <sup>2781 </sup> <n>reproach</n> כִּסְּתָ֖ה <sup>3680 </sup> <n>hath covered</n> כְלִמָּ֣ה <sup>3639 </sup> <n>shame</n> פָנָֽי׃ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>my face</n>
8: מ֭וּזָר <sup>2114 </sup> <n>I am become a stranger</n> הָיִ֣יתִי <sup>1961 </sup> <n>have</n> לְאֶחָ֑י <sup>251 </sup> <n>unto my brethren</n> וְ֝נָכְרִ֗י <sup>5237 </sup> <n>and an alien</n> לִבְנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>children</n> אִמִּֽי׃ <sup>517 </sup> <n>unto my mother's</n>
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> קִנְאַ֣ת <sup>7068 </sup> <n>For the zeal</n> בֵּיתְךָ֣ <sup>1004 </sup> <n>of thine house</n> אֲכָלָ֑תְנִי <sup>398 </sup> <n>hath eaten me up</n> וְחֶרְפּ֥וֹת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>and the reproaches</n> ח֝וֹרְפֶ֗יךָ <sup>2778 </sup> <n>of them that reproached</n> נָפְל֥וּ <sup>5307 </sup> <n>thee are fallen</n> עָלָֽי׃ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n>
10: וָאֶבְכֶּ֣ה <sup>1058 </sup> <n>When I wept</n> בַצּ֣וֹם <sup>6685 </sup> <n>with fasting</n> נַפְשִׁ֑י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>[and chastened] my soul</n> וַתְּהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> לַחֲרָפ֣וֹת <sup>2781 </sup> <n>that was to my reproach</n> לִֽי׃
11: וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <sup>5414 </sup> <n>I made</n> לְבוּשִׁ֣י <sup>3830 </sup> <n>also my garment</n> שָׂ֑ק <sup>8242 </sup> <n>sackcloth</n> וָאֱהִ֖י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>became</n> לָהֶ֣ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>like</n> לְמָשָֽׁל׃ <sup>4912 </sup> <n>and I became a proverb</n>
12: יָשִׂ֣יחוּ <sup>7878 </sup> <n>speak</n> בִ֭י יֹ֣שְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>They that sit in</n> שָׁ֑עַר <sup>8179 </sup> <n>the gate</n> וּ֝נְגִינ֗וֹת <sup>5058 </sup> <n>against me and I [was] the song</n> שׁוֹתֵ֥י <sup>8354 </sup> <n>assuredly</n> שֵׁכָֽר׃ <sup>7941 </sup> <n>strong drink</n>
13: וַאֲנִ֤י <sup>589 </sup> <n>Me</n> תְפִלָּתִֽי־ <sup>8605 </sup> <n>But as for me my prayer</n> לְךָ֨ ׀ יְהוָ֡ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>[is] unto thee O LORD</n> עֵ֤ת <sup>6256 </sup> <n>time</n> רָצ֗וֹן <sup>7522 </sup> <n>[in] an acceptable</n> אֱלֹהִ֥ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> בְּרָב־ <sup>7230 </sup> <n>in the multitude</n> חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>of thy mercy</n> עֲ֝נֵ֗נִי <sup>6030 </sup> <n>hear</n> בֶּאֱמֶ֥ת <sup>571 </sup> <n>me in the truth</n> יִשְׁעֶֽךָ׃ <sup>3468 </sup> <n>of thy salvation</n>
14: הַצִּילֵ֣נִי <sup>5337 </sup> <n>Deliver</n> מִ֭טִּיט <sup>2916 </sup> <n>me out of the mire</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶטְבָּ֑עָה <sup>2883 </sup> <n>and let me not sink</n> אִנָּצְלָ֥ה <sup>5337 </sup> <n>let me be delivered</n> מִ֝שֹּֽׂנְאַ֗י <sup>8130 </sup> <n>from them that hate</n> וּמִמַּֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <sup>4615 </sup> <n>me and out of the deep</n> מָֽיִם׃ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>waters</n>
15: אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תִּשְׁטְפֵ֤נִי ׀ <sup>7857 </sup> <n>overflow</n> שִׁבֹּ֣לֶת <sup>7641 </sup> <n>branch</n> מַ֭יִם <sup>4325 </sup> <n>of water</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תִּבְלָעֵ֣נִי <sup>1104 </sup> <n>swallow me up</n> מְצוּלָ֑ה <sup>4688 </sup> <n>me neither let the deep</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>Nor</n> תֶּאְטַר־ <sup>332 </sup> <n>shut</n> עָלַ֖י <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> בְּאֵ֣ר <sup>875 </sup> <n>and let not the pit</n> פִּֽיהָ׃ <sup>6310 </sup> <n>her mouth</n>
16: עֲנֵ֣נִי <sup>6030 </sup> <n>Hear</n> יְ֭הוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>me O LORD</n> כִּי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> ט֣וֹב <sup>2896 </sup> <n>[is] good</n> חַסְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>2617 </sup> <n>for thy lovingkindness</n> כְּרֹ֥ב <sup>7230 </sup> <n>unto me according to the multitude</n> רַ֝חֲמֶ֗יךָ <sup>7356 </sup> <n>of thy tender mercies</n> פְּנֵ֣ה <sup>6437 </sup> <n>turn</n> אֵלָֽי׃ <sup>413 </sup> <n>and do</n>
17: וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> תַּסְתֵּ֣ר <sup>5641 </sup> <n>And hide</n> פָּ֭נֶיךָ <sup>6440 </sup> <n>not thy face</n> מֵֽעַבְדֶּ֑ךָ <sup>5650 </sup> <n>from thy servant</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>I am in</n> צַר־ <sup>6887 </sup> <n>for I am in trouble</n> לִ֝֗י מַהֵ֥ר <sup>4118 </sup> <n>me speedily</n> עֲנֵֽנִי׃ <sup>6030 </sup> <n>hear</n>
18: קָרְבָ֣ה <sup>7126 </sup> <n>Draw nigh</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> נַפְשִׁ֣י <sup>5315 </sup> <n>unto my soul</n> גְאָלָ֑הּ <sup>1350 </sup> <n>[and] redeem</n> לְמַ֖עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because</n> אֹיְבַ֣י <sup>341 </sup> <n>me because of mine enemies</n> פְּדֵֽנִי׃ <sup>6299 </sup> <n>it deliver</n>
19: אַתָּ֤ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>You</n> יָדַ֗עְתָּ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Thou hast known</n> חֶרְפָּתִ֣י <sup>2781 </sup> <n>my reproach</n> וּ֭בָשְׁתִּי <sup>1322 </sup> <n>and my shame</n> וּכְלִמָּתִ֑י <sup>3639 </sup> <n>and my dishonour</n> נֶ֝גְדְּךָ֗ <sup>5048 </sup> <n>are before</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> צוֹרְרָֽי׃ <sup>6887 </sup> <n>mine adversaries</n>
20: חֶרְפָּ֤ה ׀ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>Reproach</n> שָֽׁבְרָ֥ה <sup>7665 </sup> <n>hath broken</n> לִבִּ֗י <sup>3820 </sup> <n>my heart</n> וָֽאָ֫נ֥וּשָׁה <sup>5136 </sup> <n>and I am full of heaviness</n> וָאֲקַוֶּ֣ה <sup>6960 </sup> <n>and I looked</n> לָנ֣וּד <sup>5110 </sup> <n>[for some] to take pity</n> וָאַ֑יִן <sup>369 </sup> <n>there</n> וְ֝לַמְנַחֲמִ֗ים <sup>5162 </sup> <n>but [there was] none and for comforters</n> וְלֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>none</n> מָצָֽאתִי׃ <sup>4672 </sup> <n>but I found</n>
21: וַיִּתְּנ֣וּ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>They gave</n> בְּבָרוּתִ֣י <sup>1267 </sup> <n>for my meat</n> רֹ֑אשׁ <sup>7219 </sup> <n>me also gall</n> וְ֝לִצְמָאִ֗י <sup>6772 </sup> <n>and in my thirst</n> יַשְׁק֥וּנִי <sup>8248 </sup> <n>to drink</n> חֹֽמֶץ׃ <sup>2558 </sup> <n>they gave me vinegar</n>
22: יְהִֽי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> שֻׁלְחָנָ֣ם <sup>7979 </sup> <n>Let their table</n> לִפְנֵיהֶ֣ם <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> לְפָ֑ח <sup>6341 </sup> <n>become a snare</n> וְלִשְׁלוֹמִ֥ים <sup>7965 </sup> <n>them and [that which should have been] for [their] welfare</n> לְמוֹקֵֽשׁ׃ <sup>4170 </sup> <n>[let it become] a trap</n>
23: תֶּחְשַׁ֣כְנָה <sup>2821 </sup> <n>be darkened</n> עֵ֭ינֵיהֶם <sup>5869 </sup> <n>Let their eyes</n> מֵרְא֑וֹת <sup>7200 </sup> <n>that they see</n> וּ֝מָתְנֵ֗יהֶם <sup>4975 </sup> <n>not and make their loins</n> תָּמִ֥יד <sup>8548 </sup> <n>continually</n> הַמְעַֽד׃ <sup>4571 </sup> <n>to shake</n>
24: שְׁפָךְ־ <sup>8210 </sup> <n>Pour out</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>out</n> זַעְמֶ֑ךָ <sup>2195 </sup> <n>thine indignation</n> וַחֲר֥וֹן <sup>2740 </sup> <n>upon them and let thy wrathful</n> אַ֝פְּךָ֗ <sup>639 </sup> <n>anger</n> יַשִּׂיגֵֽם׃ <sup>5381 </sup> <n>take hold</n>
25: תְּהִי־ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> טִֽירָתָ֥ם <sup>2918 </sup> <n>Let their habitation</n> נְשַׁמָּ֑ה <sup>8074 </sup> <n>be desolate</n> בְּ֝אָהֳלֵיהֶ֗ם <sup>168 </sup> <n>in their tents</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>may none</n> יְהִ֥י <sup>1961 </sup> <n>become</n> יֹשֵֽׁב׃ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>[and] let none dwell</n>
26: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אַתָּ֣ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>Yourself</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>whom</n> הִכִּ֣יתָ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>[him] whom thou hast smitten</n> רָדָ֑פוּ <sup>7291 </sup> <n>For they persecute</n> וְאֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>of</n> מַכְא֖וֹב <sup>4341 </sup> <n>to the grief</n> חֲלָלֶ֣יךָ <sup>2491 </sup> <n>of those whom thou hast wounded</n> יְסַפֵּֽרוּ׃ <sup>5608 </sup> <n>and they talk</n>
27: תְּֽנָה־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>Add</n> עָ֭וֹן <sup>5771 </sup> <n>iniquity</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>unto</n> עֲוֹנָ֑ם <sup>5771 </sup> <n>unto their iniquity</n> וְאַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ <sup>935 </sup> <n>and let them not come</n> בְּצִדְקָתֶֽךָ׃ <sup>6666 </sup> <n>into thy righteousness</n>
28: יִ֭מָּחֽוּ <sup>4229 </sup> <n>Let them be blotted</n> מִסֵּ֣פֶר <sup>5612 </sup> <n>out of the book</n> חַיִּ֑ים <sup>2416 </sup> <n>of the living</n> וְעִ֥ם <sup>5973 </sup> <n>with</n> צַ֝דִּיקִ֗ים <sup>6662 </sup> <n>with the righteous</n> אַל־ <sup>408 </sup> <n>not</n> יִכָּתֵֽבוּ׃ <sup>3789 </sup> <n>and not be written</n>
29: וַ֭אֲנִי <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> עָנִ֣י <sup>6041 </sup> <n>But I [am] poor</n> וְכוֹאֵ֑ב <sup>3510 </sup> <n>and sorrowful</n> יְשׁוּעָתְךָ֖ <sup>3444 </sup> <n>let thy salvation</n> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>O God</n> תְּשַׂגְּבֵֽנִי׃ <sup>7682 </sup> <n>set me up on high</n>
30: אֲהַֽלְלָ֣ה <sup>1984 </sup> <n>I will praise</n> שֵׁם־ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>the name</n> אֱלֹהִ֣ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>of God</n> בְּשִׁ֑יר <sup>7892 </sup> <n>with a song</n> וַאֲגַדְּלֶ֥נּוּ <sup>1431 </sup> <n>and will magnify</n> בְתוֹדָֽה׃ <sup>8426 </sup> <n>him with thanksgiving</n>
31: וְתִיטַ֣ב <sup>3190 </sup> <n>better</n> לַֽ֭יהוָה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> מִשּׁ֥וֹר <sup>7794 </sup> <n>than an ox</n> פָּ֗ר <sup>6499 </sup> <n>[or] bullock</n> מַקְרִ֥ן <sup>7160 </sup> <n>that hath horns</n> מַפְרִֽיס׃ <sup>6536 </sup> <n>and hoofs</n>
32: רָא֣וּ <sup>7200 </sup> <n>shall see</n> עֲנָוִ֣ים <sup>6035 </sup> <n>The humble</n> יִשְׂמָ֑חוּ <sup>8055 </sup> <n>[this and] be glad</n> דֹּרְשֵׁ֥י <sup>1875 </sup> <n>that seek</n> אֱ֝לֹהִ֗ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>God</n> וִיחִ֥י <sup>2421 </sup> <n>shall live</n> לְבַבְכֶֽם׃ <sup>3824 </sup> <n>and your heart</n>
33: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> שֹׁמֵ֣עַ <sup>8085 </sup> <n>heareth</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>about</n> אֶבְיוֹנִ֣ים <sup>34 </sup> <n>the poor</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>For the LORD</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲ֝סִירָ֗יו <sup>615 </sup> <n>not his prisoners</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and does not</n> בָזָֽה׃ <sup>959 </sup> <n>and despiseth</n>
34: יְֽ֭הַלְלוּהוּ <sup>1984 </sup> <n>praise</n> שָׁמַ֣יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>Let the heaven</n> וָאָ֑רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>and earth</n> יַ֝מִּ֗ים <sup>3220 </sup> <n>him the seas</n> וְֽכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and everything</n> רֹמֵ֥שׂ <sup>7430 </sup> <n>and every thing that moveth</n> בָּֽם׃
35: כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> אֱלֹהִ֨ים ׀ <sup>430 </sup> <n>For God</n> י֘וֹשִׁ֤יעַ <sup>3467 </sup> <n>will save</n> צִיּ֗וֹן <sup>6726 </sup> <n>Zion</n> וְ֭יִבְנֶה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and will build</n> עָרֵ֣י <sup>5892 </sup> <n>the cities</n> יְהוּדָ֑ה <sup>3063 </sup> <n>of Judah</n> וְיָ֥שְׁבוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>that they may dwell</n> שָׁ֝֗ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> וִירֵשֽׁוּהָ׃ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>there and have it in possession</n>
36: וְזֶ֣רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>The seed</n> עֲ֭בָדָיו <sup>5650 </sup> <n>also of his servants</n> יִנְחָל֑וּהָ <sup>5157 </sup> <n>shall inherit</n> וְאֹהֲבֵ֥י <sup>157 </sup> <n>it and they that love</n> שְׁ֝מ֗וֹ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>his name</n> יִשְׁכְּנוּ־ <sup>7931 </sup> <n>shall dwell</n> בָֽהּ׃
